Articles.Content: I have started a new career game with 23.5. I am having a problem with my new NASA parts overheating very quickly. Anyone else have this problem?
Do they actually explode if you leave it at max? Cause I'm doing some stuff with massive asparagus launchers and they get pretty high but haven't had any explode.

Do you have Deadly Re-Entry installed? There've been reports that the old DRE doesn't work properly with the new engines.

Edited April 2, 2014 by Starstrider42
Acronyms = bad
My engines overheat too if placed under high stacks of fuel tanks, but they stop at a certain level, and don't explode.

It was DRE, once I turned it off, they worked fine.

Thanks
